messages.subject: Alexander Mosle'
messages.msgSnippet: Does anyone here have a copy of Transactions of the Japan Society of London vol VIII which has an address by Alexander Mosle on Goto fittings?  I have been
messages.messageBody:
Does anyone here have a copy of 'Transactions of the Japan Society of
London' vol VIII which has an address by Alexander Mosle on Goto
fittings? I have been attempting to find this for some time and any
help would be most appreciated. Thanks much!
Pete Klein
Ft. Lauderdale, Fl.
